stories.original_headline: AI reads brain MRIs in seconds and flags emergencies
stories.original_summary: Researchers at the University of Michigan have created an AI system that can interpret brain MRI scans in just seconds, accurately identifying a wide range of neurological conditions and determining which cases need urgent care. Trained on hundreds of thousands of real-world scans along with patient
stories.fantasy_headline: Enchanted Orb Instantly Reveals Mind's Ailments, Flags Urgent Cases!
stories.fantasy_story: Wizards from the Grand Academy of Whispering Pines have enchanted a powerful orb. This artifact can peer into a person's mind in mere moments, revealing hidden ailments of the spirit-veins. It even discerns which cases require immediate magical healing, saving countless lives across the land.

stories.original_headline: Physicists discover what controls the speed of quantum time
stories.original_summary: Time may feel smooth and continuous, but at the quantum level it behaves very differently. Physicists have now found a way to measure how long ultrafast quantum events actually last, without relying on any external clock. By tracking subtle changes in electrons as they absorb light and escape a mate
stories.fantasy_headline: Chronomancers Unravel the Secret of Time's Fleeting Moments!
stories.fantasy_story: The revered Chronomancers of the Sunken Spire have made a wondrous discovery. They can now measure the duration of even the swiftest blinks of primal magic within the very fabric of existence. By observing the subtle dance of spirit motes as they absorb light, theyâ€™ve unlocked time's deepest secrets.

stories.original_headline: MrBeast just bought a banking app
stories.original_summary: Beast Industries, owned by YouTuber Jimmy "MrBeast" Donaldson, announced on Monday that it has acquired Step, a banking app designed for teens and young adults. The move comes a couple of months after Donaldson announced plans to start a new YouTube channel centered on personal finance and investing
stories.fantasy_headline: Lord Beast Acquires Young Scribes' Coin Vault for Future Merchants!
stories.fantasy_story: The famed Lord Beast, known for his grand endeavors, has announced a significant acquisition. His Beast Mercantile Conglomerate has purchased the 'Young Scribes' Coin Vault,' a special ledger for budding merchants. This move follows his recent pledge to teach the art of coin management to the realm's youth.
